import java.io.*;

public class Main {
	
	long B;

	
	public long prod ( long a, long b ) {
		long prodR = 0, base = a;
		while ( b > 0 ) {
			if ( (b&1) == 1 ) {
				prodR = prodR+base;
				if ( prodR >= B ) prodR -= B;
			}
			b >>= 1;
			base = base + base;
			if ( base >= B ) base -= B;
		}
		return prodR;
	}
	
	public void solve ( ) throws Exception
	{
		BufferedReader in;
		in = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in) );
		StringBuilder ans = new StringBuilder();
	
		int ntc = Integer.parseInt(in.readLine());
		while ( ntc-- > 0 )
		{
			String splt[] = in.readLine().split ( " ");
			int n = Integer.parseInt ( splt[0] );
			B = Long.parseLong ( splt[1] ) * 2;
			
			long r = 1;
			for ( int i = 2; i <= n; ++i )
				r = prod ( r, i%B );
			
			if ( r >= B/2 ) ans.append ( "Odd\n" );
			else ans.append ( "Even\n" );
		}
		
		System.out.print(ans);
		in.close();
	}

	public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
		new Main().solve();
	}
}
